post_message: A newborn girl thought to be only 36 to 48 hours old was found alive in Compton on Friday. The baby muffled cries led sheriff deputies to find her buried under pieces of asphalt and rubble inside a crevice near a riverbed. Detectives are now asking anyone with information to come forward. this post to alert others. Read KTLA story here: @webpagelink
